info.name: Audience Service
info.description: A collection of RESTfulAPIs to provide access to Adobe Analytics Audiences. You can change this description in localconfig.properties

url.raw: {{baseUrl}}/1.0/ares/services/audiences?expansion=expirationDate,dataViewId&locale=en_US&publishingStatuses=processing&publishingTypes=testing&audienceIds=ea sit laboris in tempor&filterIds=ea sit laboris in tempor&dataviewIds=ea sit laboris in tempor&priorities=none&includeType=expired,expired&filterByModifiedAfter=ea sit laboris in tempor&limit=10&page=0&sortDirection=ASC&sortProperty=id

query.description: Comma-delimited list of additional audience metadata fields to include on response.
Locale
Filter list to only include audiences for the specified list of publishing statuses (comma-delimited list of IDs)
Filter list to only include audiences for the specified list of publishing types (comma-delimited list of IDs)
Filter list to only include audiences for the specified list of audienceIds (comma-delimited list of IDs)
Filter list to only include audiences for the specified list of filterIds (comma-delimited list of IDs)
Filter list to only include audiences for the specified list of data view ids (comma-delimited list of IDs)
Filter list to only include audiences for the specified list of priority types (comma-delimited list of IDs)
Audience types to include.
Filter list to only include audiences modified since this date (ISO8601 format)
Number of results per page
Page number (base 0 - first page is "0")
Sort direction (ASC or DESC
Property to sort by (name, description, modifiedDate, id are currently allowed)

item.name: Returns health status of a service

query.description: (Required) Full health check required : True or False
Includes check for existence of load balancer file as part of the health check.

request.description:
This health check supports two type of operations :

* Partial health check - Simple check if a service if reachable . Set full to false

* Full health check - Checks multiple defined services and returns multiple responses related to those services . Set full to true

response.name: Service check has encountered one or more errors
